pullrequest.title: Created OperationalSpaceController plugin example that uses DART

content.raw:
That makes sense.

I might have intended the data structures to be cleared outside of this loop, perhaps to allow the physics plugins to assume that they're behind handed a blank structure. However, that somewhat conflicts with the goal of recycling these data structures to avoid unnecessary allocations and deallocations. That's something that may be worth thinking about further once we're past the proof-of-concept phase.
content.html:
That makes sense.

I might have intended the data structures to be cleared outside of this loop, perhaps to allow the physics plugins to assume that they're behind handed a blank structure. However, that somewhat conflicts with the goal of recycling these data structures to avoid unnecessary allocations and deallocations. That's something that may be worth thinking about further once we're past the proof-of-concept phase.
